title: Supplementary
text: When two angles are supplementary, it means their measures add up to $$180$$ degrees.

title: First equation

title: Second equation

title: Solve
text: Next, using the system of equations just created, solve for a. What does it equal?

title: Answer
text: The two angle measures are $$94$$ degrees and $$84$$ degrees.
